MV ANAHITA, 61K DWT         WAIHAI 16-21 AUGUST                   MV ANAHITANB BULK CARRIER BLT NANTONG 2019 FLAG: PANAMA / CLASS: LRLOA: ABT 199,90 M / BEAM: 32,24 MDEADWEIGHT: ABT 61,238 MT ON ABT 13.02 M SCANTLING DRAFTTPC ABT 60.4 MTGRT/NRT: ABT 34,618 / 20,170HOLD CAPACITY GRAIN: ABT 77,539 M3CRANES: FOUR DECK CRANES SWL 30.5 MT, GRABS FTTD 4x12 CBMSPEED (KNOTS) DAILY CONSUMPTION (MT)BALLAST ABT 14 KNOTS  VLSFO ABT 26 MT/DAY + LSG ABT 0.1 MT/DAYLADEN ABT 14 KNOTS VLSFO ABT 29 MT/DAY + LSG ABT 0.1 MT/DAYSPEED (KNOTS) DAILY CONSUMPTION ECO (MT)BALLAST ABT 12 KNOTS  VLSFO ABT 19 MT/DAY + LSG ABT 0.1 MT/DAYLADEN ABT 12 KNOTS  VLSFO ABT 20 MT/DAY + LSG ABT 0.1 MT/DAYABOVE FIGURES ARE BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4, DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 OR BELOW, NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL AND CLEAN BOTTOM.IN PORT CONSUMPTION:WHEN IDLE : VLSFO ABT 2.5 MT/DAY + LSG ABT 0.5 MT/DAY  WHEN WORKING : VLSFO ABT 5 MT/DAY + LSG ABT 0.5 MT/DAY  ALL FIGURES ARE ABOUT    RegardsChristian Friedrichphone +49 40450143141 mob +49 15110604640
